overview: The war between mutants (space machines) continues between the forces of good (the Autobots) and evil (the Decepticons). The captain of the Decepticons searches for a super chamber that gives its bearer the power to build the most powerful army in the galaxy. The only one who can get to this room and stop the Decepticons is Sam, a college student, and his girlfriend, Makila. Will he save the world Sam before the room falls into the hands of the Decepticons? Watch Transformers movie to find out
title: Transformers 2007
